## get.oc.pdf

```{r}
oc <- get.oc.pbf(target=0.3,n.cohort=10,cohortsize=3,skeleton=c(0.3,0.4,0.5,0.6),n.trial=1000,risk.cutoff=0.8,earlyterm=TRUE,start=1) ##specify the dose to start
## add titration as default option

summary(oc) # summarize design operating characteristics
plot(oc)
```
